sections.heading: of sections.The purposes of sections 43-147 to 43-154 are to:(1) Authorize the department to enter into interstate agreements with agencies of other states for the protection of children on whose behalf adoption assistance is being provided by the department; and(2) Provide procedures for interstate
sections.text: of sections.The purposes of sections 43-147 to 43-154 are to:(1) Authorize the department to enter into interstate agreements with agencies of other states for the protection of children on whose behalf adoption assistance is being provided by the department; and(2) Provide procedures for interstate children's adoption assistance payments, including medical payments.SourceLaws 1985, LB 447, ยง 2.
